removeDetectedRows() - Method in class kopper.tetris.core.BackgroundGrid
Removes all rows previously detected by the call BackgroundGrid.detectFullRows().
removeRow(int) - Method in class kopper.tetris.core.BackgroundGrid
This method is called in a for loop by BackgroundGrid.removeDetectedRows().
rightWalls - Variable in class kopper.tetris.core.TetrisGame
An internal variable to hold the gridcells that make up the RIGHT border of the game area.

This method rotates this Shape 90 degrees in the clockwise direction.
